channel.title: I F*cked Up My Beta, Here's Some of the Lessons I Learned
channel.description:
I put together a blog post on my beta process for my first product launch.
I'd like to hear to some of your stories and lessons learned regarding beta management. Here's the post: http://justinmcgill.net/i-fucked-up-my-beta-heres-what-i-learned/

item.title: I F*cked Up My Beta, Here's Some of the Lessons I Learned
item.dc:creator: JustinMcGill
item.description:
I put together a blog post on my beta process for my first product launch.

I’d like to hear to some of your stories and lessons learned regarding beta management. Here’s the post:

Justin McGill – 20 Oct 14

I Fucked Up My Beta, Here's What I Learned

This is a case study on how NOT to manage your beta. If you are launching a product and curious about running a beta, then read some of my mistakes...

Read full topic
item.source: I F*cked Up My Beta, Here's Some of the Lessons I Learned
